content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage.

Only print the simplified passage

The passage:
Due to guidelines set by the governments regarding the operation ceiling of civil drones, road-tracking based navigation is garnering interest.

DC: High school student
ILT: Medium
Provide the final version of the simplified passage
Governments have set rules about how high civil drones can fly, which has led to more interest in navigation systems that track roads.
